headline: Birch Laser Cleaning
alternativeHeadline: Advanced Laser Ablation Techniques for Birch
description: Birch wood responds optimally to near-infrared laser cleaning due to its cellulose and lignin composition. The 1064 nm wavelength provides effective absorption for controlled ablation of surface conta...
